items.sentence: Everyone in the office knew about Tom\'s problems.
I\'m not going to let Tom go to Boston by himself.
I don\'t like cats and my brother doesn\'t either.
Tom pretended he didn\'t see Mary do what she did.
She made up her mind to graduate from high school.
She started doing her homework right after dinner.
If Tom\'s not careful, he\'s going to get injured.
This is the third time that I\'ve seen this movie.
I made a list of things I needed to bring with me.
I need help translating this document into French.
